entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
